Google Calendar
ICS
NEXT Golf Tour - Virtual Golf. Real Money.
About
A tour for the many, not the few
In today’s golf world, where exploding purses and made-for-TV formats benefit players who are already superstars, the NEXT Golf Tour offers a sharp contrast. This is a place for grinders chasing their pro golf dreams, competing on the same courses you can play at any Trackman-powered indoor golf center.

About Us
About Us
At GolfSpot Miami, we're revolutionizing the golf experience with our state-of-the-art facilities, expert instruction, and welcoming community. Our mission is to create an inclusive environment where golfers of all skill levels - from beginners to seasoned pros - can connect, learn, and thrive. We believe golf is more than just a game; it's a community that deserves to be celebrated.
That's why we've designed our indoor golf facility to inspire camaraderie and foster growth. Our cutting-edge golf simulator technology allows you to play on world-famous courses from the comfort of our climate-controlled driving range. Whether you're looking to improve your swing, challenge your friends, or simply enjoy a unique golfing experience, we've got you covered.
From our expert instructors to our friendly staff, everyone at GolfSpot Miami is dedicated to helping you enjoy, improve, and immerse yourself in the world of golf. So why wait? Come visit us today and experience the ultimate indoor golf destination!"
Why Choose us?
At
GolfSpot Miami
, we bring you the best in golf with TrackMan IO technology, expert lessons, and a welcoming community.
World-Class Technology:
TrackMan IO simulators provide accurate analytics and immersive gameplay.
Flexible Bookings:
Rent by the hour or become a member for exclusive benefits.
Hours of Opperation
Monday - Saturday 7am-10pm
Sunday 9am-9pm
Golf Instruction:
Learn from experienced pros with tailored lessons for adults and juniors.
Book Now
Gallery Reel
